item.description:
I am happy to announce that Sara (Ellenbogen) will be hosting our annual get together on August 18th (2pm). Thank you very much Sara for hosting the event. This will be inside, and fifteen people probably the highest number of people we can accommodate. I suggest to have this event only for members and not for significant others.

The event is going to be in a potluck style. Sara is offering to make a main dish and a salad. We too can bring salads or main dishes, appetizers or desserts (and BYOB). The address is: 84 Grant Street #11, Somerville 02145 (Grant Street is off of Broadway, ph: 617-628-0213).

 

Looking forward to see you guys: frequent attendees, one-timers and newbies (this is a great way to meet with the group)!
item.name: Annual get together
